title: ZK I Zettel 1,5B1d1 - Niklas Luhmann-Archiv
body:
1,5B1d1
					1 "A Commenwealth is said to be instituted,when a Multitude of men do Agree, and Covenant,every one, with every one, that to whatsoever Man, orAssembly of Men, shall be given by the major part,the Right to Present the Person of them all (that is tosay, to be their Representative;) every one, as wellhe that voted for it, as he that voted against itshall Authorize all the Actions and Judgments ofthat Man, or Assembly of men, in the same manner,as if they were his own, to the end, to live peaceablyamongst themselves, and be protected againstother men." (II 18 Anfang, S. 90)
